org.goobi.production.chart

Class ProjectStatusDataTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.goobi.production.chart.ProjectStatusDataTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ProjectStatusDataTable
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A ProjectStatusDataTable object holds all the information needed for rendering a project status chart

    A ProjectStatusDataTable consists of - a name - dates of project begin and project end - a list of project tasks

    Version:
    30.10.2009
    Author:
    Karsten Köhler, Hendrik Söhnholz, Steffen Hankiewicz
    See Also:
    ProjectTask, Serialized Form
